sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO EKA.MST_PRODUCT_INSURED ( REG_SPAJ, MSTE_INSURED_NO, LSBS_ID, LSDBS_NUMBER, LKU_ID, MSPR_TSI, MSPR_PERSEN, MSPR_PREMIUM, MSPR_ACTIVE, MSPR_RATE, MSPR_EXTRA, MSPR_TT, MSPR_DISCOUNT )VALUES( #reg_spaj#, #mste_insured_no#, #lsbs_id#, #lsdbs_number#, #lku_id#, #mspr_tsi#, #mspr_persen#, #mspr_premium#, #mspr_active#, #mspr_rate#, #mspr_extra#, #mspr_tt#, #mspr_discount# )
